attributes.action: Reinstate the provisions of the Scrap Metal Dealers Act 1964.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Act was rendered ineffective by the removal of the implementation date by deregulatory legislation but left on the Statute Book.  

In view of the recent huge rise in the value of scrap metal, and the consequent increase in thefts, this legislation (which provides for registration of dealers and the keeping of records of purchases) should be reinstated
